termsConditions.text:
Loan Agreement

Cooperative Bank of Oromia LoanApp

Effective Date: March 01, 2025

This Loan Agreement ("Agreement") is between Cooperative Bank of Oromia ("Lender," "we," "us," or "our"), located at Get House Building, Africa Avenue, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, and [Borrower Full Name] ("Borrower," "you," or "your"). By accepting this Agreement in the LoanApp, you agree to its terms.

1. Loan Details

We agree to lend you the following:

  • Loan Amount: Up to 15,000 ETB (Ethiopian Birr), determined by your credit score. For this loan: 12,000 ETB.
  • Interest Rate: 8% per annum, fixed.
  • Repayment Term: 12 months.
  • Monthly Payment: 1,106.66 ETB, due on the 1st of each month.
  • Total Repayable: 13,279.92 ETB (principal + interest).

The loan amount may vary based on your credit score, with higher scores qualifying for amounts closer to 15,000 ETB. Funds will be deposited into your account ending in 1234 upon acceptance.

2. Repayment Terms

On-Time Repayment: You must repay the loan monthly, on time. Payments of 1,106.66 ETB are due by the 1st of each month, starting April 01, 2025. Pay via the LoanApp or other Bank-approved methods.

If Not Paid on Time: If you miss a payment:

  • A penalty fee of 200 ETB will be charged per late payment.
  • Your credit score may be reduced, and we will report this to credit bureaus.
  • After 15 days overdue, we may demand full repayment or take legal action.

You accept these penalties if payments are late.

3. What You Agree to by Taking the Loan

By accepting this loan, you agree to:

  • Repay the loan amount (up to 15,000 ETB, based on your credit score, 12,000 ETB for this loan) plus 8% interest, in monthly payments of 1,106.66 ETB, on time.
  • Pay the 200 ETB penalty fee and accept a credit score reduction if you miss a payment.
  • Use the loan only for personal expenses, as stated in your application.
  • Provide accurate information and update us if it changes.

To take this loan, you must agree to these terms. If you do not agree, do not accept the loan in the LoanApp.

4. Default

You are in default if you miss a payment by more than 15 days. In default, we may:

  • Charge additional penalties.
  • Reduce your credit score by reporting to credit bureaus.
  • Demand immediate repayment of the full amount owed.

5. Governing Law

This Agreement is governed by Ethiopian law. Disputes will be resolved in the courts of Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

6. Acceptance

To take this loan, click "Accept" in the LoanApp. This confirms:

  • You have read and understood this Agreement.
  • You agree to repay the loan monthly, on time, at 8% interest, with an amount up to 15,000 ETB based on your credit score.
  • You accept the 200 ETB penalty and credit score reduction if you fail to pay on time.

Contact us at support@coopbankoromia.com.et or +251 11 557 1234 with questions.
